source.sqlReaderQuery: select distinct color from SalesLT.Product where color is not null
SELECT * FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE' and TABLE_NAME in ('DimProduct','DimProductCategory','DimProductSubcategory','FactInternetSales')

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE' and table_schema='SalesLT'

select p.FirstName,p.LastName,e.JobTitle, d.Name from Person.Person p, HumanResources.Employee e,HumanResources.Department d,HumanResources.EmployeeDepartmentHistory h where p.BusinessEntityID=e.BusinessEntityID and e.BusinessEntityID=h.BusinessEntityID and d.DepartmentID=h.DepartmentID and d.Name='@{item().Name}'

activities.name: Copy  Tables OnPremise To SQL Server

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Color as string
}
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source
source split(iif(Color==$Color, true(),false()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(FileNames, Others)
ConditionalSplit1@FileNames sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesLTCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomerSource
SalesLTCustomer derive(Createdhash = sha1(FirstName+LastName+CompanyName)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, DimCustomerSource exists(Createdhash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimCustomerSource lookup(SalesLTCustomer@CustomerID == DimCustomerSource@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate), currentTimestamp(), InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SalesLTCustomer@CustomerID,
		Title = SalesLTCustomer@Title,
		FirstName = SalesLTCustomer@FirstName,
		MiddleName = SalesLTCustomer@MiddleName,
		LastName = SalesLTCustomer@LastName,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = Createdhash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesLTProductSource
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(18,0),
		ListPrice as decimal(18,0),
		Size as integer,
		Weight as decimal(18,0),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as date,
		SellEndDate as date,
		DiscontinuedDate as date,
		ThumbNailPhoto as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date,
		HashKey as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProductSource
SalesLTProductSource derive(CreateHash = sha1(Name+ProductNumber+Color)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, DimProductSource exists(CreateHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimProductSource lookup(SalesLTProductSource@ProductID == DimProductSource@ProductID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate), currentTimestamp(), InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(18,0),
		ListPrice as decimal(18,0),
		Size as integer,
		Weight as decimal(18,0),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as date,
		SellEndDate as date,
		DiscontinuedDate as date,
		ThumbNailPhoto as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date,
		HashKey as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductID = SalesLTProductSource@ProductID,
		Name = SalesLTProductSource@Name,
		ProductNumber = SalesLTProductSource@ProductNumber,
		Color = SalesLTProductSource@Color,
		StandardCost = SalesLTProductSource@StandardCost,
		ListPrice = SalesLTProductSource@ListPrice,
		Size = SalesLTProductSource@Size,
		Weight = SalesLTProductSource@Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = SalesLTProductSource@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID = SalesLTProductSource@ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate = SalesLTProductSource@SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate = DimProductSource@SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate = DimProductSource@DiscontinuedDate,
		ThumbNailPhoto = DimProductSource@ThumbNailPhoto,
		rowguid = SalesLTProductSource@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = SalesLTProductSource@ModifiedDate,
		HashKey = CreateHash,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
